summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Chad Markland and Richard Kahn regarding a DTC transfer request and a bond transfer issue. Markland confirms that there are no issues with the transfer request and mentions a small amount of cash remaining in the account.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland is responding to Richard Kahn regarding a DTC transfer request and providing updates on the status of the transfer.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is inquiring about a bond transfer issue and requesting assistance from Chad Markland.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is copied on the email correspondence between Chad Markland and Richard Kahn.

connections.description: Chad Markland is providing financial consulting services to Richard Kahn regarding a transfer request.
Jeanne Brennan is included in the email correspondence, indicating a professional connection.

events.title: DTC Transfer Request Submitted
events.description: A DTC transfer request was submitted, and Chad Markland confirms there are no issues with it.

events.title: Inquiry About Bond Transfer
events.description: Richard Kahn inquires about a bond transfer issue that has not been completed.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Chad Markland confirmed that there are no issues with the DTC transfer request submitted on May 29, 2019.
Richard Kahn requested assistance regarding a $3,000,000 bond that never transferred to Schwab.
There is a small amount of cash remaining in the account from interest posted on the same day the wire of cash went out.
